content:
Eduard Saller is a Data Scientist working for the BMW GROUP as a specialist for corporate security business intelligence.
With a strong background in NLP (natural language processing) and machine learning research he is helping to make more secure and founded decisions.
He was also part of a BMW GROUP TechOffice located in Munich, Germany, which develops vision based (object detection, object classification) and language based (information extraction, knowledge graph, question answering) systems.

title: Eduard Saller
